channel.title: Extreme lag
channel.description:
hello i have a few questions i am having some severe lag issues and i have a few ideas as to what might be causing it but i just want to make sure first before i fix any of the issues these are what im thinking might be wrong
slow computer (doubt it because it works fine with games like gunz and rappelz or flyff)
slow internet connection (also doubt it seeing as i can play css cs-cz and gmod without any lag online i also play xbox live and host any game i can and never hear complaints about lag)
firefox with about 12 tabs that i dont want to close right now (i figure most likely since the reasons i doubt the other two)
i can fix the firefox tabs and the slow computer i have 2 others that are faster as for slow internet its the most highly doubtful to me and also the only one i cannot fix
any help would be greatly appreciated

item.title: Extreme lag
item.dc:creator: @gods_50_cal gods 50 cal
item.description:
@gods_50_cal wrote:

[quote=“hippie, post:14, topic:171718”]It also may not be his computer. Loading booleanprocesses() lags a server very quickly, especialy when called every 500ms.
If anything, you could change it to call every second or more, Jagex does about a 3-30 second call on different things. That, or delete unused things out of boolean processes.[/quote]

how would i go about doing that you must understand i=noob

Read full topic

item.title: Extreme lag
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

It also may not be his computer. Loading booleanprocesses() lags a server very quickly, especialy when called every 500ms.
If anything, you could change it to call every second or more, Jagex does about a 3-30 second call on different things. That, or delete unused things out of boolean processes.

Read full topic

item.title: Extreme lag
item.dc:creator: @firedude076 firedude076
item.description:
@firedude076 wrote:

Host a server on a new computer, on an old one even if it has 1gb+ ram it still lags.

Read full topic
